Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run in his first-ever postseason game.
Manny Machado hit a two-run homer for the Padres.
Xander Bogaerts hit a two-run double to temporarily regain the lead for the Padres.
Teoscar Hernández hit a two-run single to give the Dodgers a 6-5 lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Shohei Ohtani expressed his excitement about playing in important games, stating it has always been his childhood dream.
Dodgers manager Dave Roberts praised Ohtani's ability to come through in big moments.
General manager Brandon Gomes confirmed that Ohtani would not be pitching in the postseason.
